title: Print, "Uncle Tom's Cabin"
description:
A portfolio of prints depicting scenes and characters from Uncle Tom's Cabin.  Includes a booklet of the play.

Uncle Tom's Cabin, a drama in three Acts, written expressly for and adapted only to Webb's characters & scenes in the same.  London:  printed and published by H. J. Webb, at his wholesale and retail, Theatrical Print Warehouse, 124, Old Street, St. Luke's, Finbury.  Sold by all Newsagents, Stationers, and Fancy Goods Trades in Town or Country.
